alert.note: Alert for Henderson (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued January 10 at 8:42AM EST until January 11 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON EST TODAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...A portion of western North Carolina, including the following county, Henderson. * WHEN...Until noon EST. * IMPACTS...Streams continue to remain high due to excess runoff from earlier rainfall. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 840 AM EST, Flooding of low-lying areas will linger along Mud Creek through at least midday as runoff from yesterday`s heavy rain continues to work through the basin. - Http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Stay away or be swept away. River banks and culverts can become unstable and unsafe.
